size_field = 'inlink_count'
min_size = 10
max_size = 100
node_sizes = set_node_size(G, size_field=size_field, min_size=min_size,
    max_size=max_size)
assert len(node_sizes) >= 1
assert len(node_sizes) == len(G.nodes())
assert max(node_sizes) <= max_size and min(node_sizes) >= min_size
with pytest.raises(KeyError):
    set_node_size(G, size_field='missing field', min_size=min_size,
        max_size=max_size)
